Actions TakenÂ at the Time of the RPC Inquiry
If at the time of the RPC inquiry, a DIC claim
is pending, wait to respond until
after
the claim is complete, or
has not been filed or has been denied, upload the form to the electronic claims folder (eFolder).
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C - Survivor Benefit Plan (SBP) Offsets
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C
